message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. It's a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it's still a good value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $12500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $13000. It's my final offer, and I'm confident it's a great deal.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $13000. I'm willing to pay up to $12500, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're firm on your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $12800. It's my final offer, and I'm confident it's a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $12800. I'm willing to pay up to $12500, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're still not willing to meet me at my target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $12700. It's my final offer, and I'm confident it's a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $12700. I'm willing to pay up to $12500, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from another seller.
